summary: So this is my first mod that I'm uploading that I use personally..... My idea of a thief is someone that fights without weapons, light on their feet, and can sneak by anyone at arms length and get away clean...
descriptionHtml:
Legend says that this ring once belonged to an infamous Night Thief, he was long before the Gray Fox. Now it showed up right where you start your journey.........

Found at the smithing area in Riverwood, on top/around the Iron Ingots on the floor next to the armor table is the ring.

What it gives you:

- Automatic 1 hit kill Unarmed!
- The best Sneak Skill you can imagine
- Lock picking so high that it requires you to move the mouse a fraction of an inch to get the correct placement of your pick. (YES I plan on fixing this and adding maybe 1 or two more things to the ring in the very near future.)

*** DO NOT disenchant at a table!!! It will give you the FIRST enchantment and the base Vanilla stat***

*If you can't locate the ring (maybe you got in a fight and it got kicked or something) just type in the console help night and scroll up via pg up button to look for the ring.
author: Me
